programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: Black Panther's mettle as king gets tested when an old enemy draws him into a conflict that puts his nation and the world at risk. The king must soon rally his allies and release his full power to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU struggles to find a serial predator who uses a date rape drug that leaves no evidence behind; Rollins receives some good news.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Carisi begins the long-anticipated trial of Sir Toby Moore, the SVU faces setbacks in several other cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The truth behind the alleged rape of a woman by her police officer husband comes to light when a history of domestic abuse is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives probe the backgrounds of the family of a 17-year-old girl who was raped during a hotel-opening gala.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the celebrity parents of a boy who killed himself by running into oncoming traffic.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cop-turned-activist (Eric Roberts) becomes a suspect in the killings of several rapists who were recently paroled.

Buck jumps back into the dating scene but fears he will return to his old ways; a woman goes to great extremes on a freeway overpass to get the attention of her husband; a couple have a car accident on their wedding day.

A stunt driver is caught in a hairy situation; a teenage social influencer is bugging out; the city is on high alert after two mail bombs go off; Eddie's family comes to town; Buck faces a life-or-death situation.
A teenager speeds out of control on the freeway; a routine traffic stop uncovers a shocking kidnapping; Buck struggles with his recovery.
A massive tsunami hits the Santa Monica Pier, jeopardizing the lives of both Buck and Christopher.
A massive tsunami hits the Santa Monica Pier; Buck fears the worst when Christopher goes missing.

The 118 fights an apartment building blaze and attempts a daring rescue of a blind woman trapped inside; Athena discovers a potentially sinister crime; Hen performs a risky medical procedure after an accident at a televised cooking show.

Athena investigates a mysterious murder during a neighborhood block party; the 118 rush to save lives endangered by a bomb threat; Chimney has a hard time keeping secrets when Maddie and Buck's parents come to town.
The 118 races to save the lives of workers trapped in a factory fire; Maddie reveals a painful family secret that causes Buck to confront his childhood and answer why he is the daredevil he is today.

A dry thunderstorm rolls over Los Angeles, bringing in a series of lightning strike emergencies for the 118 and leaves a first responder's life hanging in the balance; Chimney get a surprise from a visiting Albert.
As Buck's life hangs in the balance, he dreams of a world where he never became a firefighter, for better and worse.
Despite the case being closed, Bobby is determined to prove his Alcoholics Anonymous sponsor was murdered and bring his killer to justice; Buck struggles with his post-traumatic stress.

Upon her return to shore, Athena's son finds himself in trouble with the law; Buck grows envious as Eddie forms a close bond with someone else; the team rescues a woman who's stuck on receiving a rose at an iconic mansion.

Hen and Karen welcome a new addition to their family; a call unfolds involving a person's limb that's taken on a mind of its own; Eddie and Marisol take a closer look at their relationship; Buck navigates his new feelings.

After years of anticipation, Maddie and Chimney's long-awaited wedding day arrives; when the groom mysteriously vanishes, the 118 races against time to ensure he doesn't miss the most crucial day of his life.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Revival
programme.desc: As Wausau fractures, Dana's search brings her into conflict with a dangerous local family.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and D'arcy travel to an unexpected place to recover an alien device left behind by his people.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The father of an Alabama teenager calls the police after he returns home to find his son had thrown a party, leaving the place trashed; 11 minutes after the deputy leaves the house, another 911 call is placed reporting a shooting at the residence.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Rocky Mountain National Park rangers question whether a woman's fatal fall was an accident or the result of an act of violence.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Rocky Mountain National Park rangers question whether a woman's fatal fall was an accident or the result of an act of violence.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: A decorated veteran teams up with his adoptive brother to steal $32 million from a Los Angeles bank. However, when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate thieves hijack an ambulance that's carrying a wounded cop and an EMT worker.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a casino. Aided by his friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: A decorated veteran teams up with his adoptive brother to steal $32 million from a Los Angeles bank. However, when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate thieves hijack an ambulance that's carrying a wounded cop and an EMT worker.

programme.title: Jurassic World Dominion
programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Storm-chasers (Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton) finalizing their divorce try to place equipment inside a tornado on the Oklahoma plains.

programme.title: Jurassic World Dominion
programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

programme.desc: The round of 32 in the NASCAR Cup Series In-Season Challenge gets underway with the Quaker State 400. Denny Hamlin earned the tournament's top seed after a victory in Michigan, and a runner-up finish at the Great American Getaway 400 on June 22.
